entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character, Harry Potter, is mentioned as he walks through the Slytherin desks and heads for the door.

entities.name: colin
entities.description: Colin is a friend of Harry's who speaks to him about his being champion.

entities.name: potter stinks
entities.description: The phrase 'POTTER STINKS' is written on the Slytherin desks and is mentioned as a derogatory term for Harry.

entities.name: daily prophet
entities.description: The Daily Prophet is mentioned as the newspaper that wants photos of Harry.

relationships.description: The phrase 'POTTER STINKS' is directed at Harry, indicating that he is the target of this derogatory term.
The Daily Prophet wants photos of Harry, indicating that he is the target of their publicity efforts.
